Ycode

An extremely minimalist text editor based on Xcode's private DVTKit framework. That's right, a bare-bones editor that only works if a much more powerful one is installed.

Don't use it.



download

Click here for the source code. Run Build.tool to compile the app. Look at XcodeView.h if you also want to embed an Xcode editor in something.
